summary: Provides a Django TestCase suite that exercises a swappable model, checking that the model can be replaced via settings, that case‑insensitive queries operate correctly, and that generated article data and related permissions/content‑type entries are accurate.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and stability of the swappable model implementation to prevent regressions when the underlying model is swapped, ensuring proper data handling, permissions, and case‑insensitive behavior in production.
